snippet.title: Dandara - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
This video is a very early Announcement Trailer, it's been a long way since then until release, and until now with the latest Trials of Fear Edition update. 
So if you enjoy this! Be sure to check out how the game looks now:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GGDn0Ofa00M&ab_channel=RawFury
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0CCYZgpCa8s&ab_channel=RawFury

-------
Explore an abstract world, where the imaginary is tangible to solve a war that's clearly bigger than you.

Dandara is a metroidvania game initally designed for touchscreens, giving you fast paced battles and exploration that feels natural both on mobile and regular gamepads.

#SBGames2016
